tool_description: an API showing all the latest Crypto news around the world.
name: Crypto Live
title: Crypto Live

api_list.name: Crypto News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-live2.p.rapidapi.com/news/CNBC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-live2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-live2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-live2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
